posts.title: Food for Thought
posts.content:
September is Hunger Action Month and NWA Daily in cooperation with the Northwest Arkansas Food Bank is launching a subscriber campaign to support hunger awareness in NWA.

  • In Northwest Arkansas over 65k neighbors face hunger every day. With this number increasing year over year, the NWA Food Bank continues to fight for everyone to have access to nutritious food to eat.
  • Hunger Action Month is designed to inspire people to take action and raise awareness. For every new subscriber NWA Daily gets in the month of Sept., NWA Daily will donate $1. Every dollar raised helps provide at least 10 meals to children and families in the region we call home.

Make a difference in your community by sharing THIS LINK with your network.
